betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe advanced mutatron is the easiest way of making a new species! This should be the main and only way to make new bees!

Make sure you use pristine princesses only!

Combine the right princess and drone to create a queen of a new species! JEI lists all bee breeding combinations!

Once you make a queen, you should put it in an industrial apiary!

§fNo variance, no problem!
